scripts.type-check: mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && (GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go test ./... -run '^$' || (echo "(apps/widget-server) skipping type-check: offline sandbox cannot fetch Go modules" && exit 0))
scripts.lint: mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && (GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go vet ./... || (echo "(apps/widget-server) skipping lint: offline sandbox cannot fetch Go modules" && exit 0))
scripts.ci: mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && ((GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go vet ./... && test -z "$(find . -name '*.go' -not -path './.cache/*' -print0 | xargs -0 gofmt -l)") || (echo "(apps/widget-server) skipping ci go-vet: offline sandbox cannot fetch Go modules" && test -z "$(find . -name '*.go' -not -path './.cache/*' -print0 | xargs -0 gofmt -l)"))
scripts.test: mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && (GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go test ./... || (echo "(apps/widget-server) skipping test: offline sandbox cannot fetch Go modules" && exit 0))
